00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:08,460
So now let's go back to the main control. Let's explain a little bit further some of the options.

2
00:00:08,460 --> 00:00:18,300
So cache speedup, what is this? Cache speedup, it's gonna use the apply first block custom node

3
00:00:18,300 --> 00:00:27,560
to speed up things. It's good for almost all generation but it will of course have an impact

4
00:00:27,560 --> 00:00:34,560
on the quality of your image. but it's gonna be really fast. I like this the settings

Hello! This is the enhanced ChatterboxTTS with bundled support and improved chunking. It can handle very long texts by intelligently splitting them into smaller segments.
